column4: Hey all. I'm running karmic. When I login, trackerd is eating all my disk IO it takes minutes to login. Any ideas?
If you want you can turn off that service for your startup services
I know, I was just curious what could be going on
It happens to me as well whenever I have new data on my machine
Like lets say new images, mail, etc
It's what it is meant to do. If you prefer you can update the database for locate when you want and use locate command instead of tracerd
